title: Here's a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that review various aspects of Natural Language Processing (NLP) research. These articles cover a range of topics including foundational concepts, recent advancements, and specific subfields within NLP
**"A Survey of the State of the Art in Natural Language Generation: Core tasks, applications and evaluation"** by Albert Gatt and Emiel Krahmer
**"Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing: A Review"** by Yoav Goldberg
**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Named Entity Recognition from Deep Learning models"** by Yadav
**"A Survey on Text Classification: From Shallow to Deep Learning"** by Kowsari, Kamran, et al
**"A Survey of the Usages of Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing"** by Young, Tom, et al
**"A Survey on Sentiment Analysis: Approaches and Applications"** by Medhat
**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Chatbot Technology"** by Adamopoulou, Eleni, and Lefteris Moussiades
**"A Survey of Evaluation Metrics Used for NLG Systems"** by Celikyilmaz
**"A Survey on Neural Network-Based Summarization Methods"** by Dong, Yue, et al
**"A Survey on Knowledge Graphs: Representation, Acquisition, and Applications"** by Hogan, Aidan, et al
**"A Survey on Multimodal Machine Learning"** by Baltrušaitis, Tadas, Chaitanya Ahuja, and Louis-Philippe Morency
**"A Survey on Cross-lingual Word Embedding Models"** by Ruder

author.particle: on Biomedical Named Entity Recognition" by

title: **"A Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"** by Gao, Jianfeng, et al
**"A Survey on Machine Reading Comprehension: Tasks, Evaluation Metrics, and Benchmark Datasets"** by Zhang, Shuailong, et al
**"A Survey on Text Summarization Techniques"** by Gupta, Vishal, and Gurpreet Singh Lehal
**"A Survey on Natural Language Processing for Fake News Detection"** by Oshikawa
publisher: Jing Qian, and William Yang Wang

title: **"A Survey on Neural Machine Translation"** by Bahdanau
**"A Survey on Transfer Learning for Natural Language Processing"** by Ruder
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the state of NLP research up to 2021, covering both broad surveys and specific subfields
